thread.section_title: Kourtney Kardashian News and Instagram Photos from KUWTK Star | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Scott Disick joins and their kids
thread.title_full: Scott Disick joins Kourtney Kardashian and their kids | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelby Vera At Dailymail.com
title: Scott Disick joins and their kids
text:
Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian 's relationship seems to be back on right track after a tumultuous year apart.
This week the parents-of-three looked to be getting along just swimmingly as they enjoyed a vacation in Costa Rica with the entire Kardashian family.
During a Saturday outing, the on-again couple and their kids joined sister Kim and her daughter North for an unforgettable look at the Central American nation from above.
Soaring the skies: This week Scott Disick joined his 'on-again' partner Kourtney Kardashian and their kids for a family vacation in Costa Rica
Scott and Kourtney took to the skies for the mid-day helicopter ride with sister Kim and her kid.
During the trip the pair looked like they were getting along great, as the raven haired beauty and her New York born boo shared parenting responsibilities.
As they left the helicopter, the manuka honey ambassador could be seen sporting a camera around her neck while she walked four-year-old Penelope and seven-year-old Mason by the hands.
Proud parents: The pair looked like they were getting along great as they chaperoned their kids Mason, Penelope and Reign on the helicopter ride
On the helicopter: Kourtney (left) with Reign on her lap and next to Penelope as well as Kim
The reality diva looked absolutely ravishing in a white mesh top paired with daisy duke cut-offs and a mirrored sunnies.
Scott did some light lifting as he left the chopper, carrying little Reign in his arms while walking alongside the rest of the group.
He wore a practical outfit, sporting a dark teal t-shirt shirt while keeping cool with black shorts on bottom.
Sneak peek: Scott snuck this sexy shot of the mother of his kids leaning over to reveal a bit of sideboob as she during another helicopter ride together earlier this week
Getting in the bird: The eldest Kardashian sibling looked to be in good spirits
Things seem to be steadying for the formerly estranged couple.
Back in the end of December, the pair teamed up for a New Year's trip to Aspen, Colorado with their kids.
Earlier in December, Scott also put his Hidden Hills, California bachelor pad on the market, seeming to confirm he's on his way back to being a family man.
Before the flight: Kourtney walking down a path with a little girl
Reunited? The formerly estranged couple look like they may be getting back together. This week the exes enjoyed a sunny vacation with family in Costa Rica and back around the new year the pair were spotted in Aspen, Colorado with their kids
This is despite rumors that the self-proclaimed Lord Disick spent Sundance Film Festival partying away, much to the dismay of Miss Kourtney.
Whatever the status of their relationship may be, it's sure to be part of next season's reality romps.
Keeping Up With The Kardashians return to TV in March.
Interesting angle: The TV star in a red bathing suit on Sunday
